name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Halloween Night Terror: Michael Myers Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience Halloween terror with Michael Myers in this chilling live wallpaper featuring sleek design dynamic visuals and shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Michael Myers in a haunting Halloween setting with eerie effects.
Minimalist Design: Clean, intuitive interface for effortless navigation.
Clock and Date: Easily keep track of time and date.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate swiftly to your favorite websites.
Google Search Bar: Integrated search functionality for convenience.
More Extension: Additional tools to elevate your browsing experience.
It searches using the search engine selected by the user.
